description.value:
You pull colors and shapes from the depth of your mind, projecting impossible creations into the world as tapestries of astral thread or sculptures of force and light.

Granted Spells

  • 1st: @UUID[Compendium.xprpg.spells-srd.Color Spray]{Color Spray}
  • 2nd: @UUID[Compendium.xprpg.spells-srd.Mirror Image]{Mirror Image}
  • 3rd: @UUID[Compendium.xprpg.spells-srd.Sea of Thought]{Sea of Thought}
  • 4th: @UUID[Compendium.xprpg.spells-srd.Resilient Sphere]{Resilient Sphere}
  • 5th: @UUID[Compendium.xprpg.spells-srd.Etheric Shards]{Etheric Shards}
  • 6th: @UUID[Compendium.xprpg.spells-srd.Blade Barrier]{Blade Barrier}
  • 7th: @UUID[Compendium.xprpg.spells-srd.Project Image]{Project Image}
  • 8th: @UUID[Compendium.xprpg.spells-srd.Scintillating Pattern]{Scintillating Pattern}
  • 9th: @UUID[Compendium.xprpg.spells-srd.Prismatic Sphere]{Prismatic Sphere}

Standard Psi Cantrips

  • @UUID[Compendium.xprpg.spells-srd.Dancing Lights]{Dancing Lights}
  • @UUID[Compendium.xprpg.spells-srd.Shield]{Shield}

Unique Psi Cantrips

  • surface: @UUID[Compendium.xprpg.spells-srd.Imaginary Weapon]{Imaginary Weapon}
  • deeper: @UUID[Compendium.xprpg.spells-srd.Astral Rain]{Astral Rain}
  • deepest: @UUID[Compendium.xprpg.spells-srd.Hologram Cage]{Hologram Cage}
